alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otsego County through 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Richfield Springs, or 9 miles south of Ilion, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middlefield, Hartwick, Cooperstown, Westville, Springfield, Richfield Springs, Burlington, New Lisbon, Westford and Cherry Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
